item.title: Getting Started with Visual Studio Code- A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Getting Started with Visual Studio Code: A Comprehensive Guide Getting up and running with Visual Studio Code is quick and easy. As a free, cross-platform code editor, VS Code can be installed in a matter of minutes, allowing you to start coding right away. Cross-platform Availability Visual Studio Code is available for Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems, making it a versatile choice for developers across different platforms. Regardless of your system, you can install VS Code and take advantage of its powerful features.
